POSITIVE_FEEDBACK_PLACEHOLDER: #F Everything went smoothly? Are you excited? Quick...share your joy with the user.
NEGATIVE_FEEDBACK_PLACEHOLDER: #F That wasn't... exactly great. But it can be the next time! Just tell user what to improve.
ERR_CONFIRMATION_HASH_INVALID: #F Error: Confirmation hash is invalid. Sounds serious but probably isn't.
ERR_MISSING_PWD: #F Please enter password. Wait! Are you alone? Go ahead!
ERR_AD_NOT_FOUND: #F Ah! Posting wasn't found. Did it get lost or what?
ERR_WRONG_LOCATION_FORMAT: #F Location is in invalid format. Please try it again. Or try moving someplace else.
ERR_WRONG_IMAGE_TYPE: #F Unfortunately, your image is not our type. Please use .jpg or .png file.
required: #F This field is required. We hate to play the bad cop but you know these fields...
ERR_WRONG_PASSWORD:
#F Password must be at least 4 characters long. 
Yep. We like maths.
ERR_EMAIL_EXISTS: #F This is strange but it can happen! User with this email address is already registered. Do you have a doppelganger?
ERR_AD_NAME_LEN: #F Your posting is too long, Mr Shakespeare. Sorry, but our maximum length is 2500 characters.
ERR_AD_NAME_MIN_LEN: #F Your posting is too short. Please type something more.
ERR_RATING_TEXT_MIN_LEN: #F Your feedback is too short. Come on, you can do better!
ERR_KEYWORD_LEN: #F Your keyword is too long. Remember, it's a word not a short story.
ERR_RATING_TEXT_LEN: #F Hold your horses! Your comment is too long. Maximum length is 500 characters. Still beats tweeting though.
ERR_COMMENT_LEN: #F Your comment is too long. Seriously. We're sure it's great but still too long.
PROFILE_WAS_UPDATED: #F Your profile was updated. You are  like a whole new person now!
PROFILE_UPDATE_FAILED: #F Unfortunately, the changes in your profile couldn't be saved at this time. Before you jump out of window, please try again.
AVATAR_UPLOAD_SUCCESS: #F New profile picture was successfully uploaded. Wow, you look good!
AVATAR_UPLOAD_FAILED: #F Profile picture upload failed. What's wrong with your picture?!
ERR_PASSWORDS_DONT_MATCH: #F Don't freak out but your passwords don't match. Count to three now. We know you can fix it!
PASSWORD_WAS_CHANGED: #F Your password was successfully changed. **** yeah!
FORGOTTEN_PASSWORD_EMAIL_SUCCESS: #F Confirmation email was sent to your email address. To create new password, just open it and show us your clicking skills.
MISSING_PASSWORD_RESET_HASH: #F The link is invalid. Password couldn't be changed. How come, we ask with you?
PASSWORD_RESET_SUCCESS: #F Come closer! Your password was successfully changed. Now you can log in. Yes, you. Now!
ERR_WRONG_IMAGE_SIZE: #F Oops. The file is too big. Possibly huge! Please use a file smaller than 2 MB.
ERR_NOT_AUTHN: #F Oh no! Username or password is invalid. Now, which one is it?
ERR_NOT_AUTHZ:
#F Hearth was not allowed to access your profile. And feels so bad now! Please try
again.
ABOUT_TEXT: #F Hearth.net connects like-minded people who dare to offer their best and appreciate when it comes back.
EMAIL_CONFIRMATION_SUCCESS: Dein email ist bestätigt. Melden sich jetzt
EMAIL_CONFIRMATION_FAILURE: #F Confirmation code is invalid or has been already used. Those darn codes!
WHAT_YOU_NEED_OR_OFFER_PLACEHOLDER: #F Type in what you can give or accept
FEEDBACK_FORM_SPEECH_BUBBLE:
#F We're not perfect. But we can be with your help.
Let us know your feedback and we'll give you better Hearth.
Thank you!
LOG_IN_TO_POST_NEW_WISHES: #F Please, log in to post new wishes.
LOG_IN_TO_POST_RATING: #F Please, log in to post feedback
FEEDBACK_TEXT_PLACEHOLDER: #F Please let us know what works for you and what doesn't. There's always room for improvement.
SENDING_FEEDBACK_SUCCESS: #F Thanks for your response! You too are helping us getting better every day.
FORGOTTEN_PASSWORD_TEXT: #F To obtain a new password, please enter your email address and we will send you a link full of secret magic.
FORGOTTEN_PASSWORD_EMAIL_FAIL: #F Bump! A confirmation email sending failed. Did you have your fingers crossed?
TITLE: Hearth
ABOUT: #F Let us know who you are. Short and sweet.
USER_HAS_NO_WISHES: #F User has no wishes so far.
YOU_HAVE_NO_WISHES: #F You have no wishes so far.
PLEASE_WRITE_FEEDBACK_FOR: #F Please tell us what you are thanking for.
USER_HAS_NOT_BEEN_RATED: #F User has not been rated by others yet
YOU_HAVE_NOT_BEEN_RATED: #F You have not been rated by others yet
OK_ACCOUNT_CREATED: #F Yippee! Your Hearth account has been created.
OK_CHECK_YOUR_EMAIL_AND_CONFIG: #F We just sent an activation mail to your email address. Just click the link inside and dive into the world of Hearth.net.  We're excited! Are you?
REGISTER_TO_HEARTH_TEXT: #F Your new profile is just few clicks away.  Clickity click!
AD_REPLY_PLACEHOLDER: #F Are you interested? Go get in touch!
REPLY_PUBLISH_EMAIL_AGREE: #F I agree with my email address being provided to {{name}}.
SENDING_MESSAGE_IN_PROGRESS: #F Spinning the wheels, please wait... Why are people so impatient these days? Hm...
SENDING_MESSAGE_SUCCESS: #F Magic! Message has been sent. Thank you for your reply.
PASSWORD_RESET_TEXT: #F Concentrate and close your eyes! Ready? Now please enter new password for your account.
THIS_IS_BOB:
#F Are you new here? Get inspired by {{users}} people here.
See, there's nothing to it! Just say THANKS.
ERR_REPLY_EMPTY_MESSAGE: #F Write something, the message is empty. Or do not use invisible ink.
ERR_REPLY_PLEASE_AGREE: #F Please confirm you agree with your e-mail being forwarded. It's just a formality.
AD_REMOVE_ARE_YOU_SURE: #F Are you sure you want to delete this item? No one will see it again. Never ever!
AD_REMOVE_CANNOT_BE_REMOVED: #F Item cannot be deleted. You better accept that and move on.
NOTHING_FOUND: #F Too bad! We haven't found anything. Maybe if you try again and ask differently?
MY_HEARTH_NOTHING_FOUND: #F Connect with like-minded people. You can then view their needs and offers right here ahead of others.
TYPE_IN_WHAT_YOU_SEARCH_FOR: #F Looking for something or someone? We can help!
CREATE_YOUR_NEW_NEED_AND_BE_HAPPY:
#F Everybody has something to offer!
Sometimes we all need a helping hand!
Let others know you are there!
AGREE_WITH_TERMS_POPUP: #F I agree with terms of use
AGREE_WITH_TERMS_BUTTON_LABEL: #F I agree with terms of use
MY_HEARTH_BOB:
#F Add interesting people or communities into My Hearth and see what they wish for and offer right away

Simply click FOLLOW in their profile.
404_NOT_FOUND_TEXT: #F We are very sorry, but we couldn't find the page you requested.
WE_WILL_MISS_YOU__TELL_US_WHY_YOU_LEAVE: #F Shame to see you go. We will miss you. Please, let us know why are you leaving or how can we make Hearth better. We'll try to do just that, you'll see.
DO_YOU_REALLY_WANT_TO_DELETE_ACCOUNT: #F We were afraid of this. Have you made your mind up? Do you really want to delete all your traces from Hearth?
USER_HAS_BEEN_DELETED: #F Your account has been removed. Completely.
HEARTH_INVITATION_TEXT: #F Enter an email address of your friend and we`ll do the rest
INVITATION_SENDING_SUCCESS: #F Yes! An email has been sent.
CREATE_COMMUNITY_AND_BE_HAPPY: #F After you've created a community, you`ll become its administrator. Other users may ask you for permission to join community. You can then act in a name of community, create needs and offers for its members or just for anyone.
COMMUNITY_MEMBER_REMOVE_ARE_YOU_SURE: #F Are you sure you want to remove this member from your community?
LOG_IN_TO_CREATE_COMMUNITY: #F You must be logged in to create community
INDEX_GENEROUS_NETWORK: #F Generous social network for sharing gifts and skills
INDEX_SHARE_SKILLS: #F Share your skills with users on the same wavelength
INDEX_SHARE_SKILLS_TEXT: #F Do you love canning fruit? Have you travelled around the world? Are you a math enthusiast? Language teacher? Can you baby-sit kids or pets? Offer anything in HEARTH.NET.
INDEX_LET_OTHER_KNOW: #F Let other people know you have something to offer.
INDEX_MORE_OFFERS: #F There are over 2500 wishes already in HEARTH.NET system. Find them using fulltext or proximity search.
INDEX_GET_HELP_TEXT: #F Do you need a hand or guidance with your activities? Fill in your needs and others will help if they can. Because why not!
INDEX_WRITE_WISH_TEXT: #F Just express what you need. Someone will be happy to help!
INDEX_RATE_USERS: #F User rating is our currency, our fuel. Please thank people who helped you.
INDEX_FIND_TEAMMATES: #F Find teammates for your next big thing
INDEX_CONNECT_TEXT: #F Follow people you like or admire. Be the first to make their needs and offers happen.
INDEX_TRUST_TEXT: #F In My Hearth, you only see people you follow. Why not make them happy first?
INDEX_PROJECTS_TEXT: #F Just about anybody can help you to materialize a plan you are dreaming about. Create your project and watch it become reality. From guerilla gardening to community centers.
INDEX_JOIN_US: #F Join us now! It's free, of course :-)
INDEX_WHAT_THEY_SAY: #F What do people say about HEARTH.NET?
INDEX_TOMAS_HAJZLER_TITLE: #F The founder of Peoplecomm.cz and a man who is not afraid being himself.
INDEX_TOMAS_HAJZLER_TEXT: #F I am enthusiastic about Hearth.net because of its simplicity.  I just moved into an new neighborhood and I do believe that Hearth can help me in building new relationships here. After all, there has always been giving and it will be always at the core of every family. At the same time it is a technique for how to feel wonderful. I think present social networks and our global interconnectedness do work for us in an ideal way.
INDEX_PETR_VACLAVEK_TITLE: #F The person who had left top management in the world of advertising and founded spiritual blog novebohatstvi.cz.
INDEX_PETR_VACLAVEK_TEXT: #F Hearth is a wonderful place for everyone who feels the need to connect with a different world in a new and meaningful way. It is a possibility to give a gift - or a talent and doing it in such a way that will fill you with joy.
INDEX_JIRI_BARTA_TITLE: #F Giving is a joy but a gift can also be a concern - the gift is an expression of interest. The gift is also an opportunity to accept help. It is hope for some and commitment for others. The gift coming in the right time is literally a blessing.
INDEX_JIRI_BARTA_TEXT: #F Hearth.net is a great idea and I'm keeping my fingers crossed for you. I wish that Hearth brings together as many people as possible - and gifts at the right time.
INDEX_SIMON_PANEK_TITLE: #F Executive Director of People in Need, NGO
INDEX_SIMON_PANEK_TEXT: #F Hearth.net is compelling way how to come back to a simple act of giving, helping and meeting people in our ever more complex and busier world of more connections and superficial relations. It's excellent we have Hearth.net today for doing what used to be a purpose of community, extended family or a tribe.
NEW_COMMUNITY_CREATED_TEXT: #F Now you can switch to administrator view. You will act as a whole community.
